page.title: 14Strensall Children's Toys
page.content: Children{aged 7-11}in Strensall Primary School named up to three of their favourite toys. The popularity of the toys named is shown as a percentage of the total votes cast. { {Girls:}Dolls 43% and box games 26% were by far the most popular. Other toys named received under 10% of the total vote, as follows; teddy bears 8%, jigsaws 5%, building toys and toy cars 3% each, computers 2%, marbles, train sets and electronic games 1%, rocking horse, balls, models and figures under 1% each. {Boys:}models and figures 20%, toy cars 19%, box toys and building toys 18% each, computers 8%, robots 5% and electronic games 4% are far more popular than with girls. Teddy bears 2% and jigsaws 1%. Surprisingly, toy guns, marbles and table football scored under 1%. Toy trains not mentioned.
